snippet.title: The Gotchiverse PLAYDROP is HERE! | NFT Gaming Reimagined
snippet.description:
#Aavegotchi #playdrop #playtoearn #nftgame #metaverse 
In this special edition of Gotchi U we explain the upcoming PLAYDROP, where Pixelcraft's new ERC-20 tokens will be appearing every few minutes for a whole month throughout the Gotchiverse!

A special Limited Edition Golden Aaltar NFT can also be crafted, and it can ONLY be crafted during the alpha release, so make sure you don't miss out!

👀 Play now: https://verse.aavegotchi.com/ 
🤝 Borrow an Aavegotchi: https://app.aavegotchi.com/lending 

👇 Visit our website to learn more 👇
https://www.aavegotchi.com
https://www.wiki.aavegotchi.com
https://www.gotchiverse.io

👇 Join the GotchiGang community 👇
Twitter: https://twitter.com/aavegotchi  
Discord: https://discord.gg/aavegotchi
Telegram: https://t.me/aavegotchi
Official Blog: https://blog.aavegotchi.com
Medium: https://aavegotchi.medium.com/
